answers.answer: Call your doctor or go to the hospital. It won't hurt to get checked

As always drink lots of water. Swelling is normal but rapid swelling of the hands and face are not. More importantly always call your doctor when changes occur that you just aren't sure about.  In the meantime, if you can, monitor your b/p
You need to get checked asap.preeclampsia is very dangerous to u and baby

question: I've been gaining weight very fast and I'm swollen badly in the hands.  Also numb due to carpal tunnel. Don't know if there's protein in my urine because when I went to doc last time I forgot to pee in cup. Oops!I'm worried now though,  any advice?
title: Do I have preeclampsia?
